text.pt: Crepes, panquecas e café sempre prontos.
text.en: Crepes, pancakes, and coffee ready all day.

text.pt: Pergunte pelas sugestões de snacks e bebidas frescas.
text.en: Ask about snack and refreshing drink suggestions.

description.pt: Fale connosco para a sugestão de hoje.
description.en: Talk to us about today’s suggestion.
